title: डिजिटल रूप से निर्मित समुद्री तूफान की कलाकृति, ‘भगवान बुद्ध’ की शक्तियों के रूप में साझा
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: The Mighty Buddhist God Vajrapani & Indradeva wield the power of Lightning & Thunder. Many Devas in Dharmic pantheon are personifications of the forces of the Universe. In Japan we honor these deities as “Shoten Zenjin”. Man-made buildings are no match for Nature/Heaven’s Power. pic.twitter.com/Cl68Ikha1z
